org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.grouping.functions

Class CombineVertexGroupItems

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.grouping.functions.ReduceVertexGroupItems
      • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.grouping.functions.CombineVertexGroupItems
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.Function, org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.GroupCombineFunction<VertexGroupItem,VertexGroupItem>, org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.GroupReduceFunction<VertexGroupItem,VertexGroupItem>

    public class CombineVertexGroupItems
extends ReduceVertexGroupItems
implements org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.GroupCombineFunction<VertexGroupItem,VertexGroupItem>
    Combines a group of VertexGroupItem instances. Note that this needs to be a subclass of ReduceVertexGroupItems. If the base class would implement GroupCombineFunction and GroupReduceFunction, a groupReduce call would automatically call the combiner (which is not wanted).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                                                 String groupLabel,
                                                 PropertyValueList groupPropertyValues,
                                                 PropertyValueList aggregateValues)
        Creates one super vertex tuple representing the whole group. This tuple is later used to create a super vertex for each group.
        Parameters:
        superVertexId - super vertex id
        groupLabel - group label
        groupPropertyValues - group property values
        aggregateValues - aggregate values
        Returns:
        vertex group item representing the super vertex
